column4: where are ipods normally mounted?  I want to unmount mine but I can't find it.
(it's not in /media/ or /mnt/
sudo fdisk -l ... see where it's mounted and umount
or df -TH
it's /dev/sda2 in my fdisk -l, but it doesn't show up in df -TH
i was sure it shows up with fdisk -l , but wasn't sure about df
so how do I unmount it?
this might sounds stupid but did you do df -Th AFTER you umounted it?
sudo umount /dev/sda2
umount: /dev/sda2: not mounted
then it's unmounted
either that, or you got the wrong /dev/disk
so... why does the ipod still say "do not disconnect"
double check
not sure, i don't have an ipod.. too poor
did, the only things on df -TH are my main hd and 6 other <265M mounts
ipod's 2GB
yeah, i don't know why the iPod still says do not disconnect.. no experience with em
got it, i misread fdisk, it was sdb
thanks for the advice :)
no prob
